attributes.action: Abolish the current M.P. expenses and allowances system and replace it with student style loans.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current system of M.P. claims for expenses and allowances has upset and angered members of the public, who have lost confidence in M.P.'s of all parties.
Those who choose to take up politics should be offered student style loans to cover the additional costs of being an M.P. 
As students are expected to repay their loans when their income arising from their education achieves set levels, so M.P.'s should repay these loans when they receive income from lecture tours, Lobbyists, Directorships and from lucrative book deals.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
